code: @Manual{,   title = {bossr: Beta-mixture Unsupervised Oligodendrocytes Segmentation System in R},   author = {Virgilio Gonzenbach and Eunchan Bae},   year = {2023},   note = {https://vgonzenbach.github.io/bossr/, https://pennsive.github.io/bossr/}, }

title: Annotate data.frame — annotate.df
text: function takes dataframe result post.process.df (track.components) integer t (total timepoints), returns dataframe 4 columns: count, addition, deletion, survivor. count column contains number rows input dataframe "t" column value equal j, j 1 t. addition column contains number new rows dataframe time j j + 1. deletion column contains number rows dataframe time j appear dataframe later time. survivor column contains number rows dataframe time j also appear dataframe time j + 1.

title: Annotate data.frame — annotate.df
code: annotate.df(df, t)

title: Annotate data.frame — annotate.df
text: df dataframe t integer value

title: Annotate data.frame — annotate.df
text: dataframe 4 columns: count, addition, deletion, survivor.

what: Calculate threshold from 2D array using beta mixture model — betamix.2d
title: Calculate threshold from 2D array using beta mixture model — betamix.2d
text: function takes 2D array number mixture components inputs, returns threshold value. first extracts values certain intensity array, scales values 0.0001 0.9999, fits beta mixture model scaled values, calculates density difference two beta distributions. Finally, scales intersection point distributions back original scale array values returns threshold.

title: Calculate threshold from 2D array using beta mixture model — betamix.2d
code: betamix.2d(arr, mixnum = 2)

title: Calculate threshold from 2D array using beta mixture model — betamix.2d
text: arr 2D array values mixnum number mixture components use beta mixture model. Default 2.

title: Calculate threshold from 2D array using beta mixture model — betamix.2d
text: threshold value

title: Calculate threshold from 2D array using beta mixture model — betamix.2d
code: arr <- matrix(c(0, 0, 1, 5, 10, 20), nrow = 2, ncol = 3) betamix.2d(arr) #> Error in betamix.2d(arr): could not find function "betamix.2d"

what: Calculate threshold from 3D array using beta mixture model — betamix.3d
title: Calculate threshold from 3D array using beta mixture model — betamix.3d
text: function takes 3D array, number mixture components, number cores additional parameters inputs, returns threshold value. applies betamix.2d function slice 3D array  returns threshold value slice.

title: Calculate threshold from 3D array using beta mixture model — betamix.3d
code: betamix.3d(arr, mixnum = 2, n.cores = 1, ...)

title: Calculate threshold from 3D array using beta mixture model — betamix.3d
text: arr 3D array values mixnum number mixture components use beta mixture model. Default 2. n.cores number cores used parallel computing. Default 1. ... additional parameters passed mclapply

title: Calculate threshold from 3D array using beta mixture model — betamix.3d
text: threshold value

title: Calculate threshold from 3D array using beta mixture model — betamix.3d
code: arr <- array(c(0, 0, 1, 5, 10, 20), c(2,3,3)) betamix.3d(arr) #> Error in betamix.3d(arr): could not find function "betamix.3d"

what: Calculate threshold from 4D array using beta mixture model — betamix.4d
title: Calculate threshold from 4D array using beta mixture model — betamix.4d
text: function takes 4D array, number mixture components, number cores additional parameters inputs, returns threshold value. applies betamix.3d function time point 4D array  returns threshold value time point.

title: Calculate threshold from 4D array using beta mixture model — betamix.4d
code: betamix.4d(arr, mixnum = 2, n.cores = 1, ...)

title: Calculate threshold from 4D array using beta mixture model — betamix.4d
text: arr 4D array values mixnum number mixture components use beta mixture model. Default 2. n.cores number cores used parallel computing. Default 1. ... additional parameters passed mclapply

title: Calculate threshold from 4D array using beta mixture model — betamix.4d
text: threshold value

title: Calculate threshold from 4D array using beta mixture model — betamix.4d
code: arr <- array(c(0, 0, 1, 5, 10, 20), c(2,3,3,3)) betamix.4d(arr) #> Error in betamix.4d(arr): could not find function "betamix.4d"

what: Calculate threshold from image using beta mixture model — betamix.img
title: Calculate threshold from image using beta mixture model — betamix.img
text: function takes image array, number mixture components, number cores additional parameters inputs, returns threshold value. detects dimension image array applies betamix.2d(), betamix.3d(), betamix.4d() accordingly calculate threshold.

title: Calculate threshold from image using beta mixture model — betamix.img
code: betamix.img(arr, mixnum = 2, n.cores = 1, ...)

title: Calculate threshold from image using beta mixture model — betamix.img
text: arr image array mixnum number mixture components use beta mixture model. Default 2. n.cores number cores used parallel computing. Default 1. ... additional parameters passed betamix.3d() betamix.4d() functions

title: Calculate threshold from image using beta mixture model — betamix.img
text: threshold value

what: Convert a list of arrays to a Nifti object — list2nifti
title: Convert a list of arrays to a Nifti object — list2nifti
text: list2nifti() converts list arrays Nifti object using oro.nifti package.

title: Convert a list of arrays to a Nifti object — list2nifti
code: list2nifti(list, dims)

title: Convert a list of arrays to a Nifti object — list2nifti
text: list list arrays converted Nifti object. dims vector dimensions resulting array.

title: Convert a list of arrays to a Nifti object — list2nifti
text: Nifti object created input list arrays.

title: Convert a list of arrays to a Nifti object — list2nifti
code: list2nifti(list(array(1:12, c(3, 4)), array(13:24, c(3, 4))), c(3, 4, 2)) #> NIfTI-1 format #>   Type            : nifti #>   Data Type       : 2 (UINT8) #>   Bits per Pixel  : 8 #>   Slice Code      : 0 (Unknown) #>   Intent Code     : 0 (None) #>   Qform Code      : 0 (Unknown) #>   Sform Code      : 0 (Unknown) #>   Dimension       : 3 x 4 x 2 #>   Pixel Dimension : 1 x 1 x 1 #>   Voxel Units     : Unknown #>   Time Units      : Unknown  # convert a list of 3D arrays to a 4D Nifti object list2nifti(list(array(1:12, c(3, 4, 3)), array(13:24, c(3, 4, 3))), c(3, 4, 3, 2)) #> NIfTI-1 format #>   Type            : nifti #>   Data Type       : 2 (UINT8) #>   Bits per Pixel  : 8 #>   Slice Code      : 0 (Unknown) #>   Intent Code     : 0 (None) #>   Qform Code      : 0 (Unknown) #>   Sform Code      : 0 (Unknown) #>   Dimension       : 3 x 4 x 3 x 2 #>   Pixel Dimension : 1 x 1 x 1 x 1 #>   Voxel Units     : Unknown #>   Time Units      : Unknown

title: Make Overlay — make.overlay
text: 3-dimensional binary array representing overlay

title: Make Overlay — make.overlay
code: if (FALSE) { make.overlay(cell_df, dims, t) }

title: Threshold a 2D image — threshold.2d
text: function applies threshold 2D image creates binary mask pixels values greater threshold set 1 rest set 0.

title: Threshold a 2D image — threshold.2d
code: threshold.2d(img, thr)

title: Threshold a 2D image — threshold.2d
text: img 2D array image thr threshold value

title: Threshold a 2D image — threshold.2d
text: binary mask pixels values greater threshold set 1 others set 0

title: Threshold a 2D image — threshold.2d
code: threshold.2d(img, 150) #> Error in threshold.2d(img, 150): could not find function "threshold.2d"

title: Threshold a 3D image — threshold.3d
text: function applies threshold slice 3D image using threshold.2d function, creating 3D binary mask pixels values greater threshold slice set 1 rest set 0.

title: Threshold a 3D image — threshold.3d
code: threshold.3d(img, thr, n.cores = 1, ...)

title: Threshold a 3D image — threshold.3d
text: img 3D array image thr vector threshold values (one slice image) n.cores number cores use parallel processing

title: Threshold a 3D image — threshold.3d
text: 3D binary mask

title: Threshold a 3D image — threshold.3d
code: threshold.3d(img, c(120, 130, 140), 2) #> Error in threshold.3d(img, c(120, 130, 140), 2): could not find function "threshold.3d"

title: Threshold a 4D image — threshold.4d
text: function applies threshold slice time point 4D image using threshold.2d function, creating 4D binary mask pixels values greater threshold slice time point set 1 rest set 0.

title: Threshold a 4D image — threshold.4d
code: threshold.4d(img, thr, n.cores = 1, ...)

title: Threshold a 4D image — threshold.4d
text: img 4D array image thr matrix threshold values (one slice time point image) n.cores number cores use parallel processing

title: Threshold a 4D image — threshold.4d
text: 4D binary mask

title: Threshold a 4D image — threshold.4d
code: threshold.4d(img, matrix(c(120, 130, 140, 130, 140, 150), ncol = 2), 2) #> Error in threshold.4d(img, matrix(c(120, 130, 140, 130, 140, 150), ncol = 2),     2): could not find function "threshold.4d"

title: Threshold an image — threshold.img
text: function takes image threshold value applies appropriate threshold function (threshold.2d, threshold.3d, threshold.4d) based dimensionality image. also checks threshold value correct dimensionality length match image.

title: Threshold an image — threshold.img
code: threshold.img(img, thr, n.cores = 1, ...)

title: Threshold an image — threshold.img
text: img image thresholded (2D, 3D, 4D array) thr threshold value (scalar, vector, matrix) n.cores number cores use parallel processing (used threshold.3d threshold.4d)

title: Threshold an image — threshold.img
text: binary mask thresholded image (dimensionality input image)

title: Threshold an image — threshold.img
code: threshold.img(img, 150) #> Error in threshold.img(img, 150): object 'img' not found threshold.img(img, c(120, 130, 140), 2) #> Error in threshold.img(img, c(120, 130, 140), 2): object 'img' not found threshold.img(img, matrix(c(120, 130, 140, 130, 140, 150), ncol = 2), 2) #> Error in threshold.img(img, matrix(c(120, 130, 140, 130, 140, 150), ncol = 2),     2): object 'img' not found
